original_text: The sky divided into two parts. It rolled up like a piece of paper. Every mountain and every island moved away from its place.
korean_text: 하늘은 두루마리가 말리는 것 같이 떠나가고 각 산과 섬이 제 자리에서 옮겨지매

sentences.original_text: The sky divided into two parts
It rolled up like a piece of paper
Every mountain moved away from its place
Every island moved away from its place
